title: Call About Our Look & Lease Special! Free Parking Space w/Every Home!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 823 Sq.

Discover Peak living in Puyallup's cozy Sunrise neighborhood, where you can reside off the beaten path but still just steps from dining, shopping and services - with stunning views of Mount Rainier surrounding you at every turn.
Choose from one- and two-bedroom apartment homes (or opt for an even more spacious townhomes layout), each with a cozy fireplace, floor-to-ceiling windows and its own private balcony or patio.

Luxury Vinyl Plank Flooring, Extra Storage Space*, Kitchen Islands with Breakfast Bar Seating*, Featured amenity, Electronic Thermostat, Dishwasher, Shower with Bathtub in Every Home, Extra-High Vaulted Ceilings*, Featured amenity, White Subway Tile Kitchen Backsplash, Refrigerator, Walk-In Bedroom Closets*, Carpeted Bedrooms, Cozy Electric Fireplace in Living Area, Microwave, Featured amenity, Garbage Disposal, Stunning Mount Rainier views*, Featured amenity, Quartz Countertops, Private Patio or Balcony*, High-Speed Internet Ready, In-Home Washer & Dryer, Energy-Efficient, Stainless Steel Applicances, Floor-to-Ceiling Windows

Gated, Controlled Access Entry, Covered Outdoor Gathering Space with Fire Pit and BBQ, Featured amenity, Lobby Coffee Bar and Hospitality Station, Featured amenity, Recycling Collection Services, Featured amenity, Featured amenity, Attached Tandem Garages with Each Townhome*, Clubhouse Lounge with Fireplace, TV and Kitchen, Pet Stations Located Throughout the Community, Complimentary Wi-Fi Available in Common Areas, LuxerOne Package Locker System, Outdoor Playground, Workspace and Meeting Room with Free Wi-Fi, Open Lot Parking Available for Residents and Guests, 24/7 Fitness Center with Serene Wetland Views, Covered Carports Available, On-Site Management and Maintenance Team
Please contact our leasing office for specific policies and related charges.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
